privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.body:
Payslip Calculator Privacy Policy

Last updated: February 2025

1. What We Collect
This application does not collect, transmit, or store any personal data on external servers. All payslip entries, calculation history, and preferences are stored exclusively in your browser's local storage on your device.

2. Data Storage
All data remains on your device in your browser's local storage. We do not operate any backend servers or databases. You can delete all stored data at any time by clearing your browser's local storage or site data.

3. Exchange Rate Data
To display estimated remittance rates, the app fetches mid-market exchange rates from the open.er-api.com public API. No personal information is sent with these requests — only the currency pair is transmitted.

4. Third-Party Links
This application contains links to third-party remittance providers (such as Wise and Remitly). When you click these links, you leave our application and are subject to the privacy policies of those third-party services. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content or privacy practices of third-party sites.

5. Cookies
This application does not use cookies. All preferences and data are stored using the browser's localStorage API.

6. Analytics
This application does not use any third-party analytics services. No tracking pixels, fingerprinting, or behavioral analytics are employed.

7. Children's Privacy
This application is intended for working adults. We do not knowingly collect information from children.

8. Changes to This Policy
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be reflected on this page with an updated revision date.

9. Contact
If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please open an issue on our GitHub repository.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.body:
Payslip Calculator Terms of Service

Last updated: February 2025

1. Acceptance of Terms
By using Payslip Calculator, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please do not use the application.

2. Service Description
Payslip Calculator is a free tool that helps Singapore-based workers estimate payslip calculations (including overtime, deductions, and allowances) and compare estimated remittance rates across providers. All calculations are performed locally in your browser.

3. No Financial Advice
This application does not provide financial, legal, or tax advice. Payslip calculations are based on general Singapore Ministry of Manpower (MOM) guidelines and may not reflect your specific employment terms, collective agreements, or individual contract provisions. Always verify calculations with your employer or a qualified professional.

4. Estimated Rates Only
Remittance comparison rates displayed in this application are estimates only. They are calculated by applying approximate provider margins to mid-market exchange rates obtained from a public API. These are NOT live quotes from any remittance provider. Actual rates, fees, and transfer times may differ significantly. Always check the provider's official website for current pricing before making a transfer.

5. Third-Party Services
This application contains links to third-party remittance providers. We are not affiliated with, endorsed by, or responsible for any third-party service. Your use of third-party services is governed by their respective terms and conditions.

6. Affiliate Relationships
Some links to remittance providers may be affiliate links. See our Affiliate Disclosure for details. Affiliate relationships do not influence the order or presentation of provider comparisons.

7. No Warranty
This application is provided as-is without warranty of any kind, express or implied. We do not warrant that the application will be error-free, accurate, or continuously available.

8. Limitation of Liability
To the maximum extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any damages arising from your use of or inability to use this application, including but not limited to financial losses from reliance on estimated rates or calculations.

9. Data and Privacy
Please review our Privacy Policy for information about how data is handled in this application.

10. Changes to Terms
We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the application after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

11. Governing Law
These terms are governed by the laws of Singapore.

affiliateDisclosure.title: Affiliate Disclosure
affiliateDisclosure.body:
Affiliate Disclosure

Last updated: February 2025

Payslip Calculator may contain affiliate links to third-party remittance services. This means that when you click on a link to a remittance provider from our application and subsequently make a transfer or sign up for their service, we may receive a commission at no additional cost to you.

Our affiliate partners may include:
- Wise (TransferWise)
- Remitly

This commission helps us maintain and improve this free application.

Important: Our affiliate relationships do NOT influence:
- The order in which providers are displayed
- The estimated rates or fees shown
- Our comparison methodology

All rates and fees displayed are independent estimates based on publicly available mid-market exchange rate data with approximate provider margins applied. They are not provided by, endorsed by, or guaranteed by any remittance provider.

We believe in full transparency. If you have questions about our affiliate relationships, please open an issue on our GitHub repository.
